body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us today. My name is Raymond Sanders and I work for Bright Motors, a reputable car dealership. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Raymond, my name is Deborah Kelly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Deborah. To assist you further, may I kindly ask for your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Deborah. Additionally, could you please provide me with your phone number including the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is five five five, four four six, zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for sharing that information. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or any specific concerns you have regarding privacy at our dealership, Deborah?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am feeling surprised by a recent incident related to my privacy, which I would like to discuss with you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how important privacy is, and I'm here to help address your concerns. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Deborah. We will work together to resolve it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Deborah. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day.
